companyDescription: AI platform that creates emotionally intelligent voice interactions for healthcare, customer service, and consumer applications

businessFunctions.description: Core development of EVI voice-to-voice AI platform powered by Claude for emotionally intelligent conversations
Enabling customer service interactions through emotionally intelligent voice AI
Supporting customer acquisition through superior voice AI capabilities and user experience

implementation.approach: Integration of Claude with EVI voice platform for natural language understanding and generation

quantitativeMetrics.context: Percentage of users choosing Claude over other external LLMs
quantitativeMetrics.source: 36% of users choose Claude, higher than any external LLM integrated with Hume's speech-language foundation model
80% reduction in costs and 10% decrease in latency through prompt caching
80% reduction in costs and 10% decrease in latency through prompt caching

quantitativeMetrics.context: Total AI voice conversation time completed
quantitativeMetrics.source: Over 2 million minutes of AI voice conversations completed
Users have conducted over 1 million distinct conversations

qualitativeBenefits.description: Natural, emotionally intelligent conversations that feel remarkably human
qualitativeBenefits.source: Claude's natural language capabilities and emotional intelligence complement EVI's voice processing abilities perfectly, enabling fluid, context-aware conversations that feel remarkably human

qualitativeBenefits.description: Users appreciate Claude's eloquent personality and natural conversational abilities
qualitativeBenefits.source: Claude is very eloquent. It has a really good personality that people enjoy talking to

qualitativeBenefits.description: Ability to adapt to complex personality traits throughout long conversations
qualitativeBenefits.source: They've found Sonnet through EVI adapts to complex personality traits throughout a long conversation
